DescriptionData.Title: Fun Flip Clown Wig - Green
DescriptionData.Description:
A fun short wig with an adorable flip at the ends, adds lots of character to your costume.
Before wearing, shake the wig and use a pick near the wig cap to lift the curls (don't pick all the way through, as this will alter the look of the curls). Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: This fun short wig has an adorable flip at the ends
Can be teased and fluffed for fullness
Durable, comfortable, and easy to clean
